subject: Add in-game Skills And Rewards progression table
description:
It's been suggested we add an in-game popup window that would display current Skills levels and their respective rewards.
See the "official manual":http://www.splashdamage.com/wolfguide/default.htm (" Skills And Rewards" section) for description of rewards.

Only the skills progression of the selected class would be displayed, in addition to battlesense and light weapons.
